content: From the shrine, head across the bridge and stick to the left. You will find a set of buildings in the back left corner of the area, before you pass the rat enemies in the middle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sobering_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Sobering Stone'.
The content is as follows:
From the shrine, head across the bridge and stick to the left. You will find a set of buildings in the back left corner of the area, before you pass the rat enemies in the middle.
